Hello, I am wondering if it would be possible to add an inert version 
of H=
2 into the GRI30 species list and then incrementally add this to 
the react=
ing amount as the program runs?

I have tried adding it into the gri30.xml =
but Thermophase.m returns 
error when checking ctmethods for the inert H2 s=
pecies.  Perhaps there 
is symbolic code I am missing to denote non-reactin=
g?

Thanks,

Brian
